content.prompt:
© Österreichische Nationalbibliothek, Gr. 31, fol. 7r

The folio Rebecca and Eliezer at the Well from the Vienna Genesis belongs to an illuminated manuscript tradition that favors

choices.label: including multiple narrative episodes in one scene
organizing the space using hierarchical scale
embellishing the text with interlacing patterns

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
